articles.headline: Tyrese Proctor scores an NBA career-high 17 points
articles.description: Cleveland rookie Tyrese Proctor makes the most of his minutes and shoots a scorching 5/6 from deep in the Cavaliers' blowout victory against the Wizards.

images.alt: Tyrese Proctor scores an NBA career-high 17 points
